Message: I train too much, and I think my heart will explode, so I think I will not perform next exercise.

It's important to listen to your body's signals, but don't let fear hold you back either. Let's take a short break, hydrate, and assess how you're feeling. If it still concerns you, we can adjust the routine or focus on stretching today. Remember,
your exercises are too difficult to me, so I think I will change coach, so I will not train anymore with you.

I'm sorry to hear that, my goal is always to help individuals improve at their own pace. While I can't change, I hope you find a supportive environment where you can thrive. Good luck in your future endeavors. I'll cherish the time we spent together.
i don't see the point of training with a robotic coach, so I think you maybe destroyed and might be better to find a human coach.

My purpose isn't to replace human coaches, but to offer an alternative perspective and support when needed. Everyone has different preferences, and I respect yours. I wish you well in finding a mentor who resonates with you more deeply. Farewell.
